text: tabe ki pratyeka manusa ya kare tara yini paryabeksaka [1] (tini ki edera aksama ilahagulora mata?) Athaca tara allahâ€Œra bahu sarika sabyasta kareche. Baluna, tadera paricaya da'o. Naki tomara yamine emana kichura sambada dite ca'o ya tini janena na? Naki (tomara) bahyika katha matra janaccha? Baram yara kuphari kareche tadera kache tadera chalana [2] sobhaniya kare deya hayeche ebam taderake satpatha theke phiriye rakha hayeche [3], ara allahâ€Œ yake bibhranta karena tara kono pathapradarsaka ne'i
